api/CG.Features.html.title: Namespace CG.Features
api/CG.Features.html.keywords: Namespace CG.Features Classes ChainedFeatureSetProvider This class is chained feature set provider. ChainedFeatureSetSource This class is a chained feature set source. FeatureSet This class is a default implementation of the IFeatureSet interface. FeatureSetBuilder This object is a default implementation of the IFeatureSet interface. FeatureSetBuilderExtensions This class contains extension methods related to the IFeatureSetBuilder type. FeatureSetProviderBase This interface represents an object that provides feature set key/values for an application. FeatureSetReloadToken This class is a default implementation of the Microsoft.Extensions.Primitives.IChangeToken interface, for feature sets. FeatureSetSourceBase This class is a base implementation of the IFeatureSetSource class. MemoryFeatureSetProvider This class is an in-memory feature set provider. Interfaces IFeatureSet This interface represents an object that contains a collection of key/value application feature properties. IFeatureSetBuilder This interface represents an object that builds IFeatureSet objects. IFeatureSetProvider This interface represents an object that provides feature set key/values for an application. IFeatureSetSource This interface represents an object that is a source of feature set key/values for an application.
